author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The 2-Player Starter Set for Corvus Belli's new Fantasy Skirmish game WARCROW contains a pair of 100pt forces ready for the table along with terrain, a gaming mat and all the dice and tokens to play. Today I'm joined by Ben for the first of the three linked Campaign scenarios in the box as we build up the forces of the Hegemony and Northern Tribes to try out the game!

Check out all the lore HERE: https://warcrow.com/universe/nations

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.gg/CCmeRy3

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-miniature-games/

title: Let's Play! - WARCROW: The Winds from the North by Corvus Belli

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The hit miniatures-agnostic Space Fleet game VOID ADMIRAL comes storming back with a new expansion. 12 new fleets for a variety of settings, a campaign and additional rules for grappling, hex maps and more really flesh out this compact little indie darling and set even more model collections up for spending time on the table. 

Grab a copy of the expasion HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/product/508161/Void-Admiral-Renegade-Warfleets?affiliate_id=210041

Grab a copy of the core rules HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/product/470062/Void-Admiral?affiliate_id=210041

Or in print HERE: https://www.amazon.ca/Void-Admiral-Space-Combat-Miniature/dp/B0CTWXG3YK

Big thanks to Paul for the complimentary copy of the book to review. 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him
title: GMG Reviews - VOID ADMIRAL: Renegade Warfleets by Paul Bantock

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The next wave of Gale Force Nine's new line of pre-painted terrain compatible withe Legions Imperialis and Adeptus Titanics is arriving now. Let's check it out! Ranging from $30-$50 a box these kits are designed to quickly fill up your Horus Heresy battlefields in Epic Scale! These boxes represent previous kits in both a damaged and destroyed state for those looking to further fill a table or keep INCREDIBLE track of the state of buildings as the game goes on!

Thanks to GF9 for the complimentary copy of the boxes to review. 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames
